channel.title: How would i make an object which gives me an item? (like coins, 995)
channel.description: How would i make an object that if you click on it you will get an item and some experience in a skill?

item.title: How would i make an object which gives me an item? (like coins, 995)
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

Jddogg9:

autospawn.cfg i believe?

i believe that autospawn.cfg is to spawn niggas not objects.

Read full topic

item.source: How would i make an object which gives me an item? (like coins, 995)

item.title: How would i make an object which gives me an item? (like coins, 995)
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:6, topic:301295”]Put this in your client.java along with your other cases:

case ####: // replace #### with the object id addItem(####,$); // replace #### with the item id, and $ with the amount. addSkillXP((####), $); // replace #### with the amount of xp you want the object to give, and $ with the skill number. sendMessage("insert message here"); break;[/quote]

Thank you, i will try that. It looks like it would work.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i make an object which gives me an item? (like coins, 995)

item.title: How would i make an object which gives me an item? (like coins, 995)
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Put this in your client.java along with your other cases:

case ####: // replace #### with the object id addItem(####,$); // replace #### with the item id, and $ with the amount. addSkillXP((####), $); // replace #### with the amount of xp you want the object to give, and $ with the skill number. sendMessage("insert message here"); break;

Jddogg9:

autospawn.cfg i believe?
